Data set: 

$y_{i,t}$: LDR of highway section $i$ in year $t$
$i$ :      Index of highway section
$a_{i,t}$: age of highway section $i$ in year $t$
$b_{i}$:   pavement type of highway section $i$

Basic model (might be!):

$$ y_{i,t} = a_{i,t}*\gamma_{a_{i,t},b_i}*\varepsilon_{i,t}$$


---

$$ y_{t} = b_0 + b_1 x_t + \alpha_t \cdot \varepsilon_t $$
